parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Map

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Enable Map (default [[true]])

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''showMap''' show

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> show: [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>showMap [[false]]</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[showCompass]], [[showGPS]], [[showRadio]], [[showWatch]], [[showPad]], [[shownMap]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dt class="note">Unknown</dt>
<dd class="note">In Arma 2 - This command no longer works. The map is now an inventory item. It is kept under the weapon class name "itemmap".<br>
Example: <code>unitname removeweapon "itemmap"</code> To add again use <code>unitname addweapon "itemmap"</code>.

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl>
